item.title: Supermarket Analysis

Customer statisfaction: Ratings of the branch Membership Statisfaction recomendation: Evaluation on each brand and treatment on Membership type customer B. customer behaviour: what kind of product that customer bought (quantity) Payment method Busy Hour & Day (based on time and days) Recomendation: Best time/days for marketing on each product on diffrent gender in diffrent Branch
